content.rendered:
Life Hack My Microsoft 365

Microsoft 365 is the gold standard for communications and collaboration. Too often however, lots of cool features and functions in the Microsoft platform go un-used. You may be using Microsoft Teams for chat and video conferencing, but are you using it to sell more and grow your revenues? Has your company modernized your file collaboration techniques? Are you leveraging the full Microsoft suite? Now is the time Life Hack your Microsoft 365 installation. We’ll explore how to maximize the platform to sell more, serve customers better, and run a more efficient company.
 
You’ll learn:
 
• Microsoft Teams tips and tricks, especially for sales and collaboration
• File-based collaboration with Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files
• The hidden gems and free apps in the Microsoft 365 bundle
 
This session will include live demos and practical advice. Company leaders, operations staff, and team leaders will all benefit from understanding the practical applications and use cases for some of the best parts of the Microsoft 365 bundle.
 
Have questions?
Reach out to us. https://www.snaptechit.com/contact/. For more educational content, visit: https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/.
